headline: Thames Water closes in on £16bn rescue deal with lenders
summary: Thames Water is edging closer to a multibillion pound rescue deal with its lenders that would keep the ailing utility out of temporary public ownership.  Sky News has learnt that a group of creditors holding £13bn of Thames Water's total debt mountain of £20bn is aiming to sign an in-principle agreement with Ofwat and the company by the middle of next month.

headline: Invesco Mortgage Capital Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Invesco Mortgage Capital (NYSE:IVR) executives said improving financial conditions and falling interest-rate volatility helped drive stronger results in the fourth quarter of 2025, as the mortgage REIT benefited from agency mortgage outperformance and a more supportive funding backdrop.
